<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Kalistrade Follower](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=118)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Shining Kingdoms

</column>

You follow the philosophy of the Prophecies of Kalistrade, seeking to build up your wealth in this life so that you might meet the next world on your own terms.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill, and the [Kalistrade Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Bargain Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=758) skill feat.
